title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents: 13 More Stories They Wouldn't Let Me Do on T.V.
description: The moment of decision / by Stanley Ellin -- A jungle graduate / by James Francis Dwyer -- Recipe for murder / by C.P. Donnel, Jr. -- Nunc dimmittis / by Roald Dahl -- The most dangerous game / by Richard Connell -- The lady on the grey / by John Collier -- The waxwork / by A.M. Burrage -- The dumb wife / by Thomas Burke -- Crouching at the door / by D.K. Broster -- The October game / by Ray Bradburry -- Water's edge / by Robert Bloch -- The jokester / by Robert Arthur -- The abyss / by Leonard Andreyev.
author: Alfred Hitchcock
